channel.title: [Class Suggestion] The Gardener/The Botanist
channel.description:
> # [color=gray]The Gardener[/color] :shield: >**[color=gray]Neutral Social[/color]** > > **Passive (Nature's Shield)** - Prevents visits at night when you use one of your Night Abilities. > > **Day Ability (Magic Beanstalk)** - When the targeted player uses a day ability , it backfires and they target themselves. - 3 Uses(May not target The King.) > > **Night Ability (From The Ground)** - Select a player. That Player won't be able to talk or vote during the next day.(3 Uses) > **Night Ability (Mother Nature)** - Select a player. You will be able to talk as them and vote in their place the next day.(2 Uses - The Selected Player will not see your talk.)
> # [color=purple]The Botanist[/color] :shield: >**[color=purple]Unseen Social[/color]** > >**Passive (Tree Shadow)** - While alive , your Unseen members will appear as not suspicious to The Sheriff. > >**Day Ability (Treachery From The Willow)** - When the targeted player investigates someone , they will receive incorrect feedback. - 3 Uses > >**Night Ability (Flower Power)** - Select a player. Any abilities against that player will target instead random players.(2 Uses - CAN Target The King) >**Night Ability (Disloyal Until The End)** - Your Vote will count as many times as there are Unseen dead. If Nobody is executed the next day , you will gain Death Immunity the next night.(1 Use)

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Gardener/The Botanist
item.dc:creator: Hippolytus
item.description:
If I was you I’d get rid of the unseen convert and make it an anti-BD neutral in some capacity.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Gardener/The Botanist
item.dc:creator: NAOtheRitualist
item.description:
Do we really want a convertable neut? Yeah it would be good as neut.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Gardener/The Botanist
item.dc:creator: Hippolytus
item.description:
I really like the abilities. They don’t seem that helpful to BD though, or maybe that’s just me? Have you considered making it into a Neutral Social? I think it could fix a couple of holes in a super interesting concept!

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Gardener/The Botanist
item.dc:creator: Alice
item.description:
Just avoid BD Socials in general. So far there have been very few BD Social class suggestions here that were actually good, Nuke’s Spy was basically a once-in-a-blue-moon suggestion.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Gardener/The Botanist
item.dc:creator: Alice
item.description:
NAOtheRitualist:

Passive (Nature’s Shield) - Prevents visits at night when you use one of your Night Abilities.

Way too strong. You’re essentially night immune as long as you aren’t occupied or prevented from visiting your target.

NAOtheRitualist:

Day Ability (Magic Beanstalk) - When the targeted player uses a day ability , it backfires and they target themselves. - 3 Uses(May not target The King.)

Sounds like FoL’s Pants on Fire. Seems good, but would fit better in an offensive or support class.

NAOtheRitualist:

Night Ability (From The Ground) - Select a player. That Player won’t be able to talk or vote during the next day.(3 Uses)

Negative utility. There is no reason why a BD-aligned class should have a blackmail/chill ability.

NAOtheRitualist:

Night Ability (Mother Nature) - Select a player. You will be able to talk as them and vote in their place the next day.(2 Uses - The Selected Player will not see your talk.)

See above.

NAOtheRitualist:

Passive (Tree Shadow) - While alive , your Unseen members will appear as not suspicious to The Sheriff.

Far too strong. This is having the Duchess’ limited-use ability as a passive.

NAOtheRitualist:

Day Ability (Treachery From The Willow) - When the targeted player investigated someone , they will receive incorrect feedback. - 3 Uses

This ability seems fine.

NAOtheRitualist:

Night Ability (Flower Power) - Select a player. Any abilities against that player will target instead random players.(2 Uses - CAN Target The King)

Remove the RNG. As I said before, if your class card has an ability with the word “random” in it, then it needs to be scrapped ASAP.

NAOtheRitualist:

Night Ability (Disloyal Until The End) - Your Vote will count as many times as there are Unseen dead. If Nobody is executed the next day , you will gain Death Immunity the next night.(1 Use)

Strong, but will out the user. So I’d say this is fine as a last-ditch attempt to go past MyLo for the Unseen.

Overall this class needs a lot of work. To be frank, this is a BD social class. Even people who typically make very balanced and unique classes tend to absolutely screw the pooch whenever they try to make a BD social class as they’re stupidly hard to make.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Gardener/The Botanist
item.dc:creator: Htm
item.description:
Yeah it’s hard… really hard to make one whose unconfirmable, unique (not this meaning to not mimic Msy / Noble), and one that’s fun

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Gardener/The Botanist

Making a Social class that’s original. Hold on give me 8 years

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Gardener/The Botanist
item.dc:creator: Htm
item.description:
NAOtheRitualist:

will target instead random players.

No rng plz

NAOtheRitualist:

Your Vote will count as many times as there are Unseen dead. If Nobody is executed the next day , you will gain Death Immunity the next night.(1 Use)

This is kind of too obvious

NAOtheRitualist:

Night Ability (From The Ground) - Select a player. That Player won’t be able to talk or vote during the next day.(3 Uses)

A BD social most of the time does not need this.

Gardner’s sorta confirmable and you can’t claim it as the Botanist imo, maybe try to decrease the confirmability or botanist these abilities instead but slighty buffed?

NAOtheRitualist:

Night Ability (Mother Nature) - Select a player. You will be able to talk as them and vote in their place the next day.(2 Uses - The Selected Player will not see your talk.)

NAOtheRitualist:

Night Ability (From The Ground) - Select a player. That Player won’t be able to talk or vote during the next day.(3 Uses)

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Gardener/The Botanist
item.dc:creator: NAOtheRitualist
item.description:
The Gardener

Neutral Social

Passive (Nature’s Shield) - Prevents visits at night when you use one of your Night Abilities.

Day Ability (Magic Beanstalk) - When the targeted player uses a day ability , it backfires and they target themselves. - 3 Uses(May not target The King.)

Night Ability (From The Ground) - Select a player. That Player won’t be able to talk or vote during the next day.(3 Uses)
Night Ability (Mother Nature) - Select a player. You will be able to talk as them and vote in their place the next day.(2 Uses - The Selected Player will not see your talk.)

The Botanist

Unseen Social

Passive (Tree Shadow) - While alive , your Unseen members will appear as not suspicious to The Sheriff.

Day Ability (Treachery From The Willow) - When the targeted player investigates someone , they will receive incorrect feedback. - 3 Uses

Night Ability (Flower Power) - Select a player. Any abilities against that player will target instead random players.(2 Uses - CAN Target The King)
Night Ability (Disloyal Until The End) - Your Vote will count as many times as there are Unseen dead. If Nobody is executed the next day , you will gain Death Immunity the next night.(1 Use)

Read full topic
